name: Link more profiles
description: Be able to connect up to 25 Overwatch profiles to your Discord ID.

name: Less commands cooldown
description: Reduce commands cooldown by 50%; from 3 seconds to 1.5 second per command.

name: SRs performance graph
description: Unlock the 'profile graph' command and see your SRs performance wrapped in a graph.

name: Change embeds color
description: Be able to connect up to 25 Overwatch profiles to your Discord ID.

name: Discord role
description: Receive the Premium role on OverBot's official Discord server.
